DOC.brief_summary: This is a 2-3 period parallel group study with an adaptive element in Type 2 diabetes patients receiving vildagliptin as add-on therapy to metformin
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Long-Term Safety of Vildagliptin as Add-on Therapy to Metformin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients 1878 years old inclusive at Visit 1 T2DM patients treated with metformin for at least 3 months and a stable dose of at least 1500 mg daily for a minimum of 4 weeks prior to Visit 1 Patient agreement to maintain same dose of metformin throughout study HbA1c of ≥ 7.0 and ≤ 9.5 % at Visit 1 Body Mass Index (BMI) in the range of 2245 kg/m2 at visit 1 Pregnant or nursing (lactating) women FPG ≥ 270 mg/dL ( ≥ 15.0 mmol/L)
